property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 ά and +1 sanity for each Tome asset you control. θ: One at a time, resolve an η ability on each Tome asset you control, ignoring their η cost. (Limit once per game.) ε effect: +1. You may return a Tome asset from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck Size: 30. Deckbulding Options: Tome cards level 0-5, Seeker cards (λ) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to five other level 0 Guardian and/or Mystic cards (κ and/or μ). Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Daisy's Tote Bag, The Necronomicon (John Dee Translation), 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Daisy Walker deck only. Advanced. You have 2 additional hand slots, which can only be used to hold Tome assets. ι When you play a Tome asset during your turn, exhaust Daisy's Tote Bag: That asset gains fast.

property.name: Text
property.value: Advanced. Revelation – Put this card into play in your threat area, with 3 horror on it. It cannot leave play while it has 1 or more horror on it. While it is in play, treat each ε you reveal on a chaos token as β, γ, and δ (resolve all three). η: Move 1 horror from this card to Daisy Walker. Then, if this card has no horror on it, discard it.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is the number of Tome assets Daisy Walker controls. β: Reveal another token. If you fail, discard the top 2 cards of your deck. γ: –2. If this is an attack or evasion attempt against Namer of the Dead and you do not succeed by at least 2, it attacks you. δ: –3. If you fail, Daisy Walker takes 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is 1 more than the number of Tome assets Daisy Walker controls. β: Reveal another token. If you fail, discard the top 3 cards of your deck. γ: –3. If this is an attack or evasion attempt against Namer of the Dead and you do not succeed by at least 3, it attacks you. δ: –5. If you fail, Daisy Walker takes 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dr. Henry Armitage does not take up an ally slot and gains: "You have 2 additional hand slots, which can only be used to hold Tome assets." "Jazz" Mulligan gains: "η: Move to a Miskatonic location up to 3 connections away."

property.name: Text
property.value: Ignore all Objectives on locations. θ If you are Daisy Walker, investigators at your location spend 1 π clues: Shuffle 1 facedown player card beneath this location into your deck. Objective – Find a way to banish the Namer of the Dead before it is too late.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Prey – Daisy Walker only. Forced – When Namer of the Dead would be defeated: Instead, fully heal it, exhaust it, and move it to Orne Library. η If you are Daisy Walker and you control at least 4 non-weakness Tome assets: Parley. Test ά (18). This test gets –2 difficulty for each Tome asset you control. If you succeed, advance the act.
